root: ^Annie: Sooo, ready to watch some shitty TV?
^I mean, we could CHOOSE to watch something good.
^Isn't it weird how with thousands of choices there never seems to be anything good to watch.

positive: ^Annie: Yeah but it is impossible to know what is good witout looking up everything

Negative: ^Annie: This is the problem. I constantly change programs all the time.
